item.title: About Content Strategy
item.description: Content Strategy A Master’s programme at the FH Joanneum in Graz The web has turned companies into media companies. As a result, there is a need for first-class content strategists. Our part-time degree course is the first academic programme in Europe which trains students for this role. Join us and help establish content strategy as a discipline for the methodical development of web content in the German-speaking world. You can also find all information about this degree programme at: Content Strategy

item.title: About COS20 Students
item.description: Welcome to our personal site Group Website for Digital Publishing Platform We - Alexandra, Katharina, Markus, Tamara & Xandi - are students at the FH Janneum in Graz and are currently completing the first semester of the Master’s programme “Content Strategy”. For our Assignment #4 in Digital Publishing Platform, we were asked to create a website that represented our group work. Therefore, we welcome you to our group site. You will find a short, personal description of ourselves below.
